co.janicek.core.LineageCore

type
class
Functions for objects that have lineage. Objects must have a "parent" object. Lineages are terminated by a null parent.

Static Methods

public isRoot( node : { parent : Null<Dynamic>} ) : Bool

Detect the root node.

public lineage<T>( node : lineage.T ) : Iterable<lineage.T>

Lineage iterator. Iterates parent objects until null is reached. TODO: Detect and throw on circular references.

public root<T>( node : root.T ) : root.T

Get the root node.
